summary:
The 4th installment of the most endorsed SFX preset ever.
.Extremely performance friendy.
.Watch the trailers dude.
.Added Lite version.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/JwpqU8g.png[/img][youtube]MA8w4yABPPQ[/youtube][img]http://i.imgur.com/ruuocHC.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fdji9Kz.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zsOmyMT.png[/img][youtube]3rQNSIbIVM8[/youtube][img]http://i.imgur.com/M448fje.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75954/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/9iCJulU.png[/img][/url][img]http://i.imgur.com/HMyc6pw.png[/img][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/2jNdkGD.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/XyyOYEh.jpg[/img]

[/url][color=#ffff00][size=3][font=Verdana][color=#00ff00][size=6]HOW TO INSTALL VIDEO AT THE BOTTOM[/size][/color][/font]

YOU CAN'T RUN SKYRIM RELOADED?[/size][/color] Its ok it will work anyways.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]YOU DONT USE ANY WEATHER MOD, ONLY VANILLA?[/size][/color] Its ok it will work and look nice too!
[color=#ffff00][size=3]WHAT ARE MY SKYRIM RELOADED SETTINGS?[/size][/color] Just avoid "coloring" "bloom" "sharpening" and "SMAA"
[color=#ffff00][size=3]ICBINE 4 HITS YOUR FPS TOO HARD?[/size][/color] Try the "ICBINE 4 Light" version.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]NO NMM BUTTON, HOW TO INSTALL?[/size][/color] Place the files on the Skyrim folder (not the Data, in the folder where the executable is)
[color=#ffff00][size=3]I STILL DONT UNDERSTAND HOW TO INSTALL IT[/size][/color] I hate you, but you should try to check in Google
[color=#ffff00][size=3]I DONT LIKE THE BLOOM[/size][/color] Open SweetFX_settings and disable Bloom.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]IT LOOKS TOO SHARP/GRITTY MY EYES EXPLODED[/size][/color] Open SweetFX_settings and tweak "Luma Sharpen" shader or just disable it with changing the 1 to a 0 "in #define USE_LUMASHARPEN      1", save the file and exit.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]I DONT LIKE HOW ITS DARKER ON THE EDGES[/size][/color] Open SweetFX_settings and change the 1 into a 0 in  "#define USE_VIGNETTE      1", save file and exit.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]THE COLORS ARE TOO STRONG/THE COLORS ARE TOO WEAK[/size][/color] Open SweetFX_settings and lower/raise the VIBRANCE shader values, save file and close.
Alternatively you can install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]IMAGINATOR[/url] and tweak the colors and stuff ingame.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]THE SKY LOOKS SO BLUE IN SOME SCREENSHOTS![/size][/color] Yes I use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]IMAGINATOR[/url] for making it darker.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]INTERIOR SETTINGS FOR ELFX?[/size][/color] NONE.
[color=#ffff00][size=3]I HAVE THIS ISSUE WITH SKGE/SKYRIM RELOADED/ENB[/size][/color] Ask in that mod page.[/center]
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][u][color=#ff0000]SHORT DESCRIPTION[/color]
[/u][color=#ff0000]This is a SweetFX preset, a shader injector kinda like ENB but only for colors and some image effects, nice part: its EXTREMELY performance friendly, I started it with an Athlon II and a GT 240 and the FPS hit was minimal, this time I added some effects that may be a little more heavier than the previous ones, but dont worry there's ICBINE 4 Lite too.


[/color][color=#00ff00][size=6]MY MOD LIST [/size][size=3](I use the parallax fix from ENBOOST)[/size]
[/color][spoiler]{[img]http://i.imgur.com/6FBcyVq.png[/img]}[/spoiler]

[color=#00ff00][size=6]IF YOU USE ENBOOST
[/size][/color][/font][spoiler]{[img]http://i.imgur.com/EJKIs3F.png[/img]}[/spoiler]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#00ff00][size=6]IF YOU USE WINDOWS 10
[/size][/color][size=6][spoiler]{[img]https://i.imgur.com/odIsw20.png[/img]}[/spoiler]
[youtube]fag2J9hLiKM[/youtube][youtube]zoumOwGWzI0[/youtube][youtube]dtS5ad-xGMQ[/youtube]

[/size][/font][/center]
author: Elsopa
